name: iOS 16.7.5 and iPadOS 16.7.5
available: iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPad 5th generation, iPad Pro 9.7-inch, and iPad Pro 12.9-inch 1st generation

advisories.available: iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPad 5th generation, iPad Pro 9.7-inch, and iPad Pro 12.9-inch 1st generation
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

cves.credit: Noah Roskin-Frazee and Prof. J. (ZeroClicks.ai Lab)

advisories.available: iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPad 5th generation, iPad Pro 9.7-inch, and iPad Pro 12.9-inch 1st generation
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPad 5th generation, iPad Pro 9.7-inch, and iPad Pro 12.9-inch 1st generation
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may result in disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Michael DePlante (@izobashi) of Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPad 5th generation, iPad Pro 9.7-inch, and iPad Pro 12.9-inch 1st generation
advisories.impact: An app may be able to corrupt coprocessor memory
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Pan ZhenPeng (@Peterpan0927) of STAR Labs SG Pte. Ltd.

advisories.available: iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPad 5th generation, iPad Pro 9.7-inch, and iPad Pro 12.9-inch 1st generation
advisories.impact: A user's private browsing activity may be visible in Settings
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved handling of user preferences.

advisories.available: iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPad 5th generation, iPad Pro 9.7-inch, and iPad Pro 12.9-inch 1st generation
advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPad 5th generation, iPad Pro 9.7-inch, and iPad Pro 12.9-inch 1st generation
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Nan Wang (@eternalsakura13) of 360 Vulnerability Research Institute

advisories.available: iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPad 5th generation, iPad Pro 9.7-inch, and iPad Pro 12.9-inch 1st generation
advisories.impact: A maliciously crafted webpage may be able to fingerprint the user
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with improved access restrictions.

advisories.available: iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPad 5th generation, iPad Pro 9.7-inch, and iPad Pro 12.9-inch 1st generation
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been exploited.
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved checks.
